  then they are equal everywhere on `[a, b]`. -/

  by
  simp only [‚Üê @sub_eq_zero _ _ (f _)] at hi‚ä¢
  exact
    hi ‚ñ∏
      constant_of_has_deriv_right_zero (fcont.sub gcont) fun y hy => by
        simpa only [sub_self] using (derivf y hy).sub (derivg y hy)
